entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
